I regret doing so and apologise for any offence caused." Photo / Mark Mitchell

Comanchero gang member orchestrated 200kg drug import from inside prisonhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/comanchero-gang-member-orchestrad-200kg-drug-import-from-inside-prison/TD2XLD5QYVG6NN4IVOPGNCOG2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/comanchero-gang-member-orchestrad-200kg-drug-import-from-inside-prison/TD2XLD5QYVG6NN4IVOPGNCOG2E/ Jared Savage, George BlockOperation Brewer cracked encrypted phone messages to unravel the ingenious plot. Surgery reveals shocking appendix cause of American Suzanne Summerlin’s decade-long pelvic infections https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/surgery-reveals-shocking-appendix-cause-of-american-suzanne-summerlins-decade-long-pelvic-infections/NZEQMQZMKBDQFEDQAK6UEXUMWY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/surgery-reveals-shocking-appendix-cause-of-american-suzanne-summerlins-decade-long-pelvic-infections/NZEQMQZMKBDQFEDQAK6UEXUMWY/ Sandra G Boodman'It’s a bit of a horror to think that I had this Franken-thing in my body.'
